20110120035935.000|20110120035937.000|CC1|TO WRITER, IT IS WRONG TO ASK   
20110120035937.000|20110120035938.000|CC1|SOMEONE IF THEY WROTE A BOOK    
20110120035938.000|20110120035941.000|CC1|WHERE THE AUTHOR IS LISTED AS
